description.en: If, `amAvasyA` occurs on a Monday, Tuesday or Thursday, the combination gives the tithi the name `puSkalA` and is equal to a solar eclipse.

references_secondary: Smrti Mukthaphalam Shraddha Kandam Uttara Bhaga
shlokas:
amA sOmEna bhaumEna guruNA vA yutA yadi.
sA tithiH puSkalA nAma sUryagrahaNasannibhA..
